title: Blended Language Online Education Design for Adult Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A language education course for professionals (medical/legal/technical) aged 40+, combining online platforms and offline sessions for flexibility, with digital device provision

learning_goals: Perform at least two weekly learning activities on the online learning management system (LMS) within two weeks
Utilize blended learning language content to apply workplace-related basic terminology with 80% accuracy
Achieve over 70% of weekly learning objectives through peer feedback and formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
